channel.title: OMFG! im so anoyed, how do i make nonwild zones!? how to plot the coords?
channel.description:
hi i need to no how to make non wild zones no you have to go client.java then go to nonwild then i see this
[code]if((absX >= 3161 && absX <= 3240 && absY >= 3804 && absY <=3866 ) || (absX >= 2954 && absX <= 3004 && absY >= 3679 && absY <=3709 ) || (absX >= 3249 && absX <= 3253 && absY >=3431 && absY <=3437 ) || (absX >=3231 && absX <=3248 && absY >=3601 && absY <=3618 ) ||(absX >=3250 && absX <=3257 && absY >=3419 && absY <=3423 )|| (absX >=2952 && absX <=2961 && absY >=3021 && absY <=3027 )|| (absX >=3148 && absX <=3181 && absY >=3177 && absY <=3687 )|| (absX >=3097 && absX <=3114 && absY >=3926 && absY <=3942 )|| (absX >=3560 && absX <=3570 && absY >=3307 && absY <=3319 )|| (absX >=2981 && absX <=3008 && absY >=3928 && absY <=3966 )|| (absX >=2422 && absX <=2431 && absY >=3072 && absY <=3083 )|| (absX >= 2903 && absX <= 2924 && absY >= 9843 && absY <=9843 ) ||[/code]
i dont get how to plot the coords. can somebody please help?
(i made the last one and it didnt work.)

hi i need to no how to make non wild zones no you have to go client.java then go to nonwild then i see this

if((absX >= 3161 && absX <= 3240 && absY >= 3804 && absY <=3866 ) || (absX >= 2954 && absX <= 3004 && absY >= 3679 && absY <=3709 ) || (absX >= 3249 && absX <= 3253 && absY >=3431  && absY <=3437 ) || (absX >=3231  && absX <=3248 && absY >=3601  && absY <=3618 ) ||(absX >=3250  && absX <=3257 && absY >=3419  && absY <=3423 )|| (absX >=2952  && absX <=2961 && absY >=3021  && absY <=3027 )|| (absX >=3148  && absX <=3181 && absY >=3177  && absY <=3687 )|| (absX >=3097  && absX <=3114 && absY >=3926  && absY <=3942 )|| (absX >=3560  && absX <=3570 && absY >=3307  && absY <=3319 )|| (absX >=2981 && absX <=3008 && absY >=3928  && absY <=3966 )|| (absX >=2422 && absX <=2431 && absY >=3072  && absY <=3083 )|| (absX >= 2903 && absX <= 2924 && absY >= 9843 && absY <=9843 ) ||
